aaron k. white

a little about me...

I'm an Interaction designer and developer hanging my hat in Denver, CO. I'm currently building the next generation of productivity applications at WebFilings and recently I co-founded/created an app to showcase recipes online called Savorly.

I used to build shit for Empire Avenue & MySQL. You can see some more of my work over on Dribbble. Feel free to drop me an email aaron [at] aaronkwhite [dot] com with any questions, comments, trivia or any general statements of fact that I may not be aware of.

Colophon

I designed, wrote, photographed & coded this... it's powered by Foundation, Jekyll and Github Pages. I'm using 'FF Tisa Web Pro' & 'Freight Sans Pro' powered by Typekit of course. My iMac, Macbook Pro retina, Sublime Text 2, Codekit and CS6 were not harmed in the production of this site.

Really Tall... Really Amazing!
